grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 漂流【ヒョウリュウ】drifting, drift, being adrift
漂々【ヒョウヒョウ】buoyantly, airily, with a light heart
kun reading compounds: 漂う【ただよう】to drift, to float, to waft (e.g. a scent), to hang in the air, to be in the air (e.g. a feeling or mood), to wander, to walk around aimlessly, to be unsteady, to be unstable, to falter, to flinch, to wince, to live in unreliable circumstances
